title: Johnny Depp Supporters...
description: Please sign and share this petition to get the UK Sun to retract the "wife beater" story that has defamed Johnny and has caused him a great amount of stress and loss of movie roles for years. Amber Heard has been proven to be a liar... all the abuse accusations are false. Let's support Johnny together, we can do this! Â https://chng.it/8V9rvyvh

title: Hi everyone... Thanks for signing the petition to support Johnny!!
description:
Together we can do this... please get your friends to sign and in support of Johnny, share, share, share!! Have a great weekend!

Depp fans united!

Linda C.
